waiver.title: Transitional governance freshness bypass
waiver.description:
Permits transitional governance mode to bypass stop-uncertainty
deadline denial while no authenticated governance transport is
available. The local deterministic resolver (GovernancePolicyResolver)
cannot provide real governance freshness evidence because it is
in-process and always succeeds. Real governance transport arrives
in rollout phase S1.5 (cross-cell governance channel).

This waiver expires automatically and MUST be renewed or replaced
by authenticated governance transport wiring.
conditions: Must be renewed or replaced before expiry
Logged at WARN level with waiver ID on every bypass
After expiry, PreActuationGate denies with StopUncertain
